title: Riot had the perfect opportunity to give Xerath a skin next patch, but nope, not even after 4 years

replies.body: I'm actually incredibly surprised that Karma was chosen. Not to offend anyone who mains or plays her, that skin just doesn't really fit her.
monkaS I think a certain Tolan main is having flashbacks

I think it fits her in the same way it suits Orianna.

It's this kind of dark beauty.
It fits Orianna because Orianna has an orb to function as her dark star.
Thank you. I feel like I am the only one put off by the design and concept of DS Karma. It does not match her at all.

I do like champions that aren't easily visible in a skinline being throw into it, it challenge my way of viewing of just always going for what seem obvious (dark start urgot made so much sense in my head, but §I bet no one think of the pool party Urgot concept I am having, the same way a Zac main maybe have some crazy skin idea that we would never think as fitting for him).

I'm gonna give that an upvote. I do think Shaco needed that skin. Karma wasn't in the worst spot but I think it's okay she got it. Jhin is Jhin and popularity blablabla, it's totally understandable.

However, I understand the bitterness you must feel right now. I know it feels bad, so yeah, take my upvote. I don't main Xerath, but I main Syndra, and from a powerful being to a powerful being, we must support each other!

Yeah, I'm upvoting this. Dark Star is such a perfect opportunity to give skins to champions who haven't had them in a long time. Xerath, Rek'Sai, Vel'Koz, even Skarner could work. I know that Riot's trying to play it safe this year because of financial reasons, and I honestly think Karma is a better fit for Dark Star than Orianna, but like...come on. You should have given Shaco a Battle Boss skin for the Arcade event and done a surprise comeback champion for Dark Star instead. Come to think of it, I have a feeling that Shaco and Zilean might be the only champions with big skin gaps getting a skin this year. 

At least I can have a bit of hope for Santa Ornn come Christmastime.

EDIT: By the way, I do want to clarify that I don't think these are bad choices for Event Horizon, but I'm particularly disappointed that **this** was the new Shaco skin instead of saving him for something even more fitting, and instead having a non-moneymaker champion with a large skin gap that **wasn't** already confirmed to be getting a skin this year. That aside, though, I do think that these will be good skins. I just wish that Riot would take a few more risks lately, especially given a couple of their recent choices for Battle Academia.

Agree with Dark Star {{champion:161}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:72}} , but Rek'Sai's effects already have a real Dark Purple colour on her default skin so I think Arcade/Battle Boss would be better for her, and if you want a more serious theme Mecha or Elderwood can work.

mecha is the awful too clunky and boring. but i agree. why shaco? dark star fits better with cosmic/evil dark champions like Vel or Xerath. Even Morde is a better fit than Shaco. Plus Shaco has such an old outdated look it ruins the skin.
I would have thought Karma literally perfect for the Cosmic half of that universe......

>
> shouldnt they vgu Zilean first? He looks terrible and his skin wont be very good since he is so outdated.

That's Riot's decision, and he was confirmed to be getting a skin this year months ago. But it'll probably be his last skin before he gets reworked. Only thing keeping him from being top priority is that his kit is actually pretty good, and it probably won't be changed too much.

> [{quoted}](name=EdgeLady,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6LJJdJkT,comment-id=00070001,timestamp=2019-05-28T23:35:40.426+0000)

They put a lot of effort into the skin true (ult sfx etc) but like you said he need a good non-legacy and knight kled aint it, it also wouldn't be a problem if it wont be like 3 years for the next one.
Iverns skin was like one made just to shut people up about him not getting a skin, he may not be lux but come on there where so many great concepts like Wildfire or Void.

> [{quoted}](name=Akali Prime,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6LJJdJkT,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2019-05-28T23:04:32.144+0000)

Kassadin already has a Cosmic Reaver skin.

I honestly wasn't expecting Dark Star skins this year, let alone the ones we got.

Honestly, though, if Xerath is getting a skin this year, its probably Battle Boss. Its probably not the skin Xerath mains want, but that's just what seems most likely to me.

The Battle Boss skins are pretty consistently good though. He doesn't really have a fun one like that either. I think its still Veigar's best skin years later (although to be fair, its a legendary. Still, it was a perfect theme for him). I think it could potentially suit Xerath, surely SOME Xerath players are going to want something like that?

Some will, some won't. People will always find something to complain about when their main gets a new skin. "I wanted a more serious skin", "I wanted a sillier skin", "here's what skin themes would've been better", ect. Xerath is no different, I'm sure.

I mean whatever they make I'll almost certainly buy, but Dark Star Xerath has been a popular skin concept among Xerath mains for while now.  I do think a more serious skin is generally wanted.

As I said though, I'll just be happy getting a good skin.
Sorry you'll need to wait more for a blue Xerath chroma
I'm getting just a wee bit annoyed that jhin is getting it instead, I would've traded jhin for xerath any day honestly. Jhin is getting skins CRAZY fast for how new he still kinda is.
Xerath really deserves a skin of today's quality

I hope they have a great skin for him planned, worthy of the wait, the theme of Dark Star fits Xerath so well. There are Xerath mains who aren't spending money on the game, even if they are few and far between.

I'm not happy, as a Jhin main. 

This skin doesn't fit him.

It doesn't fit Karma either.

I wish Xerath got it, it would've been amazing.

Shaco was approaching 1500 days without a skin so I am happy about him but I do agree Xerath fits the theme better.


Also this is coming from Shaco main, so if I am not biased why is Riot biased?
isnt yorick still the record holder for ther longest time without a skin?
He literally just got Meowrick

?
how long did he wait between the skin before meowrick and meowrick?

We have to consider that he got a set of complete skins due to the rework which should count here. 

Even then: 

02-Oct-2017  - Arclight Yorick. 

Its been less then 2 years. 

Meanwhile Xerath hasn't gotten a skin in 4 years.
To me Dark Star Karma is like Dark Star Jarvan IV all over again.

Exactly what i thought. Imagine the most improbable champs to get dark star before xerath. 
This Is why i'm happy not to play right now

Skins Team bias showing again.

They don’t like certain champions = said champions will never get skins.

Even when the thematic is perfect. It’s so blatant now that the video they did about how they care about every1 and try to do the best thematics is just a pile of bull fertilizer.

Heck even Taric would have been a better choice.

Look at the bright side, the Dark Star skins are the worst skins in the game, basically just spamming one colour for every last thing so it is hard to make out any details when actually playing the game.

Then again, Dark Star would probably actually work on Xerath...
Agreed, its getting stale now that they're slapping the dark star theme on more champions, j4 was a failure, they should've stopped with him.

> [{quoted}](name=Original Sin,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6LJJdJkT,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-05-29T05:29:42.854+0000)
>
> Agreed, its getting stale now that they're slapping the dark star theme on more champions, j4 was a failure, they should've stopped with him.

thats not the issue. its that they give them to old outdated champs or champs that dont fit. Dark Star IS supposed to be about evil monsters so Xerath and void/shadow isles champs would fit more than Jhin and Shaco. WHich is sad.

Honestly, Dark Star is good for Xerath, but not Dark Cosmic, which seems significantly more pressed towards a type of intergalactic Royal entities. They definitely seem connected to Dark Star though, as it's pretty explicit with the themees, but Dark Star seems significantly more Monstrous. 

Or I could be talking out my ass cause i missed some Skin lore dropped at some point :T
I believe only Jhin is Dark Cosmic, the other two are Dark Star

Sorry but Shaco doesnt fit with that skin. Also he is an outdated stuff champ which makes it not as good on him. They should have given it to Morde or someone with a more modern look that could utilize it to its full potential. Feel the same way about Orianna as those are the 2 weakest DS skins. Also I thought DS was just gonna be for the Darkin Void and Shadow Isles. It would be cool having this skin line be their evil team up thing. But Karma and Jhin work well here too.
